   19: -module(map_SUITE).
   20: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   21:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   22:          groups/0]).
   23: 
   24: -export([t_build_and_match_literals/1, t_build_and_match_literals_large/1,
   25:          t_update_literals/1, t_update_literals_large/1,

   27:          t_update_map_expressions/1,

   60:

   62:          t_erlang_hash/1,

   65:

   67:          t_bif_build_and_check/1,
   68:          t_bif_merge_and_check/1,
   69:

   82:          t_dets/1,

   89:          y_regs/1,
   90: 
   91:          %% Bugs
   92:          t_large_unequal_bins_same_hash_bug/1,
   93: 
   94: 	 %% Display
   95: 	 t_map_display/1]).
   96: 
   97: %% Benchmarks
   98: -export([benchmarks/1]).
   99: 
  100: %% Helper for generating new colliding keys after the internal hashing
  101: %% algorithm changes.
  102: -export([find_colliding_keys/1]).
  103: 
  104: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
  105: 
  106: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
  107: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
  108: 
  109: -define(CHECK(Cond,Term),
  110: 	case (catch (Cond)) of
  111: 	    true -> true;
  112: 	    _ -> io:format("###### CHECK FAILED ######~nINPUT:  ~p~n", [Term]),
  113: 		 exit(Term)
  114: 	end).
  115: 
  116: suite() -> [].
  117: 
  118: all() ->
  119:     [{group,main}, benchmarks].
  120: 
  121: groups() ->
  122:     [{main,[],
  123:       [t_build_and_match_literals, t_build_and_match_literals_large,
  124:        t_update_literals, t_update_literals_large,
  125:        t_match_and_update_literals, t_match_and_update_literals_large,
  126:        t_update_map_expressions,
  127:        t_update_assoc, t_update_assoc_large, t_update_assoc_sharing,
  128:        t_update_exact, t_update_exact_large,
  129:        t_guard_bifs,
  130:        t_guard_sequence, t_guard_sequence_large,
  131:        t_guard_update, t_guard_update_large,
  132:        t_guard_receive, t_guard_receive_large,
  133:        t_guard_fun, t_list_comprehension,
  134:        t_update_deep,
  135:        t_map_equal, t_map_compare,
  136:        t_map_sort_literals,
  137: 
  138:        %% Specific Map BIFs
  139:        t_bif_map_get,t_bif_map_find,t_bif_map_is_key,
  140:        t_bif_map_keys, t_bif_map_merge, t_bif_map_new,
  141:        t_bif_map_put,
  142:        t_bif_map_remove,
  143:        t_bif_map_take, t_bif_map_take_large,
  144:        t_bif_map_update,
  145:        t_bif_map_values,
  146:        t_bif_map_to_list, t_bif_map_from_list,
  147:        t_bif_map_next,
  148: 
  149:        %% erlang
  150:        t_erlang_hash, t_map_encode_decode,
  151:        t_gc_rare_map_overflow,
  152:        t_map_size, t_map_get, t_is_map,
  153: 
  154:        %% non specific BIF related
  155:        t_bif_build_and_check,
  156:        t_bif_merge_and_check,
  157: 
  158:        %% maps module
  159:        t_maps_fold, t_maps_map,
  160:        t_maps_size, t_maps_without,
  161: 
  162: 
  163:        %% Other functions
  164:        t_hashmap_balance,
  165:        t_erts_internal_order,
  166:        t_erts_internal_hash,
  167:        t_pdict,
  168:        t_ets,
  169:        t_tracing,
  170:        t_hash_entropy,
  171: 
  172:        %% instruction-level tests
  173:        t_has_map_fields,
  174:        t_get_map_elements,
  175:        y_regs,
  176: 
  177:        %% Bugs
  178:        t_large_unequal_bins_same_hash_bug,
  179: 
  180:        %% Display
  181:        t_map_display]},
  182:     {benchmarks, [{repeat,10}], [benchmarks]}].
  183: 
  184: run_once() ->
  185:     case ?MODULE of
  186: 	map_SUITE ->
  187:             %% Canononical module name. Run these cases.
  188:             [{group,once}];
  189:         _ ->
  190:             %% Cloned module. Don't run.
  191:             []
  192:     end.
  193: 
  194: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  195:     A0 = case application:start(sasl) of
  196: 	     ok -> [sasl];
  197: 	     _ -> []
  198: 	 end,
  199:     A = case application:start(os_mon) of
  200: 	     ok -> [os_mon|A0];
  201: 	     _ -> A0
  202: 	 end,
  203:     [{started_apps, A}|Config].
  204: 
  205: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  206:     As = proplists:get_value(started_apps, Config),
  207:     lists:foreach(fun (A) -> application:stop(A) end, As),
  208:     Config.
  209: 
  210: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  211:     Config.
  212: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  213:     erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config).
  214: 
  215: 
  216: %% tests
  217: 
  218: t_build_and_match_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  219:     #{} = id(#{}),
  220:     #{1:=a} = id(#{1=>a}),
  221:     #{1:=a,2:=b} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b}),
  222:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c"} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c"}),
  223:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d"} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d"}),
  224:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>} =
  225: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>}),
  226:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>,{"6",7}:="f"} =
  227: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>,{"6",7}=>"f"}),
  228:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>,{"6",7}:="f",8:=g} =
  229: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>,{"6",7}=>"f",8=>g}),
  230: 
  231:     #{[]:=a,42.0:=b,x:={x,y},[a,b]:=list} =
  232:          id(#{[]=>a,42.0=>b,x=>{x,y},[a,b]=>list}),
  233: 
  234:     #{<<"hi all">> := 1} = id(#{<<"hi",32,"all">> => 1}),
  235: 
  236:     #{a:=X,a:=X=3,b:=4} = id(#{a=>3,b=>4}), % weird but ok =)
  237: 
  238:     #{ a:=#{ b:=#{c := third, b:=second}}, b:=first} =
  239: 	id(#{ b=>first, a=>#{ b=>#{c => third, b=> second}}}),
  240: 
  241:     M = #{ map_1=>#{ map_2=>#{value_3 => third}, value_2=> second}, value_1=>first},
  242:     M = #{ map_1:=#{ map_2:=#{value_3 := third}, value_2:= second}, value_1:=first} =
  243: 	 id(#{ map_1=>#{ map_2=>#{value_3 => third}, value_2=> second}, value_1=>first}),
  244: 
  245:     %% error case
  246:     %V = 32,
  247:     %{'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{<<"hi all">> => 1} = id(#{<<"hi",V,"all">> => 1}))),
  248:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3,x:=2} = id(#{x=>3}))),
  249:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=2} = id(#{x=>3}))),
  250:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id({a,b,c}))),
  251:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id(#{y=>3}))),
  252:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id(#{x=>"three"}))),
  253:     ok.
  254: 
  255: t_build_and_match_literals_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  256:     % normal non-repeating
  257:     M0 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  258:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  259:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  260:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  261:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  262: 
  263:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  264:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  265:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  266:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  267:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" }),
  268: 
  269:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M0,
  270:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M0,
  271:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M0,
  272:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M0,
  273:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M0,
  274: 
  275:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M0,
  276:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M0,
  277:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M0,
  278:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M0,
  279:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M0,
  280: 
  281:     60 = map_size(M0),
  282:     60 = maps:size(M0),
  283:     60 = apply(erlang, id(map_size), [M0]),
  284:     60 = apply(maps, id(size), [M0]),
  285: 
  286:     % with repeating
  287:     M1 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  288:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  289:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  290:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  291:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  292: 
  293:                10=>na0,20=>nb0,30=>"nc0","40"=>"nd0",<<"50">>=>"ne0",{["00"]}=>"n10",
  294:                11=>na1,21=>nb1,31=>"nc1","41"=>"nd1",<<"51">>=>"ne1",{["01"]}=>"n11",
  295:                12=>na2,22=>nb2,32=>"nc2","42"=>"nd2",<<"52">>=>"ne2",{["02"]}=>"n12",
  296: 
  297:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  298:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  299:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  300: 
  301:                13=>na3,23=>nb3,33=>"nc3","43"=>"nd3",<<"53">>=>"ne3",{["03"]}=>"n13",
  302:                14=>na4,24=>nb4,34=>"nc4","44"=>"nd4",<<"54">>=>"ne4",{["04"]}=>"n14",
  303: 
  304:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  305:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" }),
  306: 
  307:     #{10:=na0,20:=nb0,30:="nc0","40":="nd0",<<"50">>:="ne0",{["00"]}:="n10"} = M1,
  308:     #{11:=na1,21:=nb1,31:="nc1","41":="nd1",<<"51">>:="ne1",{["01"]}:="n11"} = M1,
  309:     #{12:=na2,22:=nb2,32:="nc2","42":="nd2",<<"52">>:="ne2",{["02"]}:="n12"} = M1,
  310:     #{13:=na3,23:=nb3,33:="nc3","43":="nd3",<<"53">>:="ne3",{["03"]}:="n13"} = M1,
  311:     #{14:=na4,24:=nb4,34:="nc4","44":="nd4",<<"54">>:="ne4",{["04"]}:="n14"} = M1,
  312: 
  313:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M1,
  314:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M1,
  315:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M1,
  316:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M1,
  317:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M1,
  318: 
  319:     60 = map_size(M1),
  320:     60 = maps:size(M1),
  321:     60 = apply(erlang, id(map_size), [M1]),
  322:     60 = apply(maps, id(size), [M1]),
  323: 
  324:     % with floats
  325: 
  326:     M2 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  327:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  328:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  329:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  330:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  331: 
  332:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  333:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  334:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  335:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  336:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19",
  337: 
  338:                10.0=>fa0,20.0=>fb0,30.0=>"fc0",
  339:                11.0=>fa1,21.0=>fb1,31.0=>"fc1",
  340:                12.0=>fa2,22.0=>fb2,32.0=>"fc2",
  341:                13.0=>fa3,23.0=>fb3,33.0=>"fc3",
  342:                14.0=>fa4,24.0=>fb4,34.0=>"fc4",
  343: 
  344:                15.0=>fa5,25.0=>fb5,35.0=>"fc5",
  345:                16.0=>fa6,26.0=>fb6,36.0=>"fc6",
  346:                17.0=>fa7,27.0=>fb7,37.0=>"fc7",
  347:                18.0=>fa8,28.0=>fb8,38.0=>"fc8",
  348:                19.0=>fa9,29.0=>fb9,39.0=>"fc9"}),
  349: 
  350:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M2,
  351:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M2,
  352:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M2,
  353:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M2,
  354:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M2,
  355: 
  356:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M2,
  357:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M2,
  358:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M2,
  359:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M2,
  360:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M2,
  361: 
  362:     #{10.0:=fa0,20.0:=fb0,30.0:="fc0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M2,
  363:     #{11.0:=fa1,21.0:=fb1,31.0:="fc1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M2,

  599:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  600:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  601: 
  602:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  603:                   16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  604:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  605:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  606:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
  607: 
  608:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  609:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  610:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  611:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  612:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  613: 
  614:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  615:                   k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  616:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  617:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  618:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => id("large map key 2") }),
  619: 
  620:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M5,
  621:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M5,
  622:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M5,
  623:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M5,
  624:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M5,
  625: 
  626:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M5,
  627:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M5,
  628:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M5,
  629:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M5,
  630:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M5,
  631: 
  632:     #{ #{ one => small, map => key }    := "small map key 1",
  633:        #{ second => small, map => key } := "small map key 2",
  634:        #{ third => small, map => key }  := "small map key 3" } = M5,
  635: 
  636:     #{ #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  637:           11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  638:           12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  639:           13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  640:           14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  641: 
  642:           15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  643:           16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  644:           17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  645:           18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  646:           19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } := "large map key 1",
  647: 
  648:        #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  649:           11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  650:           12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  651:           13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  652:           14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  653: 
  654:           15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  655:           k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  656:           17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  657:           18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  658:           19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } := "large map key 2" } = M5,
  659: 
  660:     95 = map_size(M5),
  661:     95 = maps:size(M5),
  662:     95 = apply(erlang, id(map_size), [M5]),
  663:     95 = apply(maps, id(size), [M5]),
  664: 
  665:     %% remember
  666: 
  667:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M0,
  668:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M0,
  669:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M0,
  670:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M0,
  671:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M0,
  672: 
  673:     #{10:=na0,20:=nb0,30:="nc0","40":="nd0",<<"50">>:="ne0",{["00"]}:="n10"} = M1,
  674:     #{11:=na1,21:=nb1,31:="nc1","41":="nd1",<<"51">>:="ne1",{["01"]}:="n11"} = M1,
  675:     #{12:=na2,22:=nb2,32:="nc2","42":="nd2",<<"52">>:="ne2",{["02"]}:="n12"} = M1,
  676:     #{13:=na3,23:=nb3,33:="nc3","43":="nd3",<<"53">>:="ne3",{["03"]}:="n13"} = M1,
  677:     #{14:=na4,24:=nb4,34:="nc4","44":="nd4",<<"54">>:="ne4",{["04"]}:="n14"} = M1,
  678: 
  679:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M1,
  680:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M1,
  681:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M1,
  682:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M1,
  683:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M1,
  684: 
  685:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M2,
  686:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M2,
  687:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M2,
  688:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M2,
  689:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M2,
  690: 
  691:     #{10.0:=fa0,20.0:=fb0,30.0:="fc0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M2,
  692:     #{11.0:=fa1,21.0:=fb1,31.0:="fc1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M2,
  693:     #{12.0:=fa2,22.0:=fb2,32.0:="fc2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M2,
  694:     #{13.0:=fa3,23.0:=fb3,33.0:="fc3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M2,
  695:     #{14.0:=fa4,24.0:=fb4,34.0:="fc4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M2,
  696: 
  697:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M3,
  698:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M3,
  699:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M3,
  700:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M3,
  701:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M3,
  702: 
  703:     #{10.0:=fa0,20.0:=fb0,30.0:="fc0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M3,
  704:     #{11.0:=fa1,21.0:=fb1,31.0:="fc1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M3,
  705:     #{12.0:=fa2,22.0:=fb2,32.0:="fc2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M3,
  706:     #{13.0:=fa3,23.0:=fb3,33.0:="fc3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M3,
  707:     #{14.0:=fa4,24.0:=fb4,34.0:="fc4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M3,
  708: 
  709:     #{15.0:=fa5,25.0:=fb5,35.0:="fc5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M3,
  710:     #{16.0:=fa6,26.0:=fb6,36.0:="fc6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M3,
  711:     #{17.0:=fa7,27.0:=fb7,37.0:="fc7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M3,
  712:     #{18.0:=fa8,28.0:=fb8,38.0:="fc8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M3,
  713:     #{19.0:=fa9,29.0:=fb9,39.0:="fc9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M3,
  714: 
  715:     #{36893488147419103232:=big1,67108863:=big8,"45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M3,
  716:     #{147573952589676412928:=big3,8589934592:=big6,"46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M3,
  717:     #{4294967296:=big5,18446744073709551616:=big4,"47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M3,
  718:     #{4294967295:=big7,73786976294838206464:=big2,"48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M3,
  719: 
  720:     ok.
  721: 
  722: 
  723: t_map_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  724:     0 = map_size(id(#{})),
  725:     1 = map_size(id(#{a=>1})),
  726:     1 = map_size(id(#{a=>"wat"})),
  727:     2 = map_size(id(#{a=>1, b=>2})),
  728:     3 = map_size(id(#{a=>1, b=>2, b=>"3","33"=><<"n">>})),
  729: 
  730:     true = map_is_size(#{a=>1}, 1),
  731:     true = map_is_size(#{a=>1, a=>2}, 1),
  732:     M = #{ "a" => 1, "b" => 2},
  733:     true  = map_is_size(M, 2),
  734:     false = map_is_size(M, 3),
  735:     true  = map_is_size(M#{ "a" => 2}, 2),
  736:     false = map_is_size(M#{ "c" => 2}, 2),
  737: 
  738:     Ks = [build_key(fun(K) -> <<1,K:32,1>> end,I)||I<-lists:seq(1,100)],
  739:     ok = build_and_check_size(Ks,0,#{}),
  740: 
  741:     %% try deep collisions
  742:     %% statistically we get another subtree at 50k -> 100k elements
  743:     %% Try to be nice and don't use too much memory in the testcase,
  744: 
  745:     N  = 500000,
  746:     Is = lists:seq(1,N),
  747:     N  = map_size(maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-Is])),
  748:     N  = map_size(maps:from_list([{<<I:32>>,I}||I<-Is])),
  749:     N  = map_size(maps:from_list([{integer_to_list(I),I}||I<-Is])),
  750:     N  = map_size(maps:from_list([{float(I),I}||I<-Is])),
  751: 
  752:     %% Error cases.
  753:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
  754:                     {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
  755:                       (catch map_size(T))
  756:               end),
  757:     ok.
  758: 
  759: t_map_get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  760:     %% small map
  761:     1    = map_get(a, id(#{a=>1})),
  762:     2    = map_get(b, id(#{a=>1, b=>2})),
  763:     "hi" = map_get("hello", id(#{a=>1, "hello"=>"hi"})),
  764:     "tuple hi" = map_get({1,1.0}, id(#{a=>a, {1,1.0}=>"tuple hi"})),
  765: 
  766:     M0    = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
  767:     "v4" = map_get(<<"k2">>, M0#{<<"k2">> => "v4"}),
  768: 
  769:     %% large map
  770:     M1   = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)] ++
  771: 			  [{a,1},{b,2},{"hello","hi"},{{1,1.0},"tuple hi"},
  772: 			   {k1,"v1"},{<<"k2">>,"v3"}]),
  773:     1    = map_get(a, M1),
  774:     2    = map_get(b, M1),
  775:     "hi" = map_get("hello", M1),
  776:     "tuple hi" = map_get({1,1.0}, M1),
  777:     "v3" = map_get(<<"k2">>, M1),
  778: 
  779:     %% error cases
  780:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
  781: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{erlang,map_get,_,_}|_]}} =
  782: 			  (catch map_get(a, T))
  783: 	      end),
  784: 
  785:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,{1,1}},[{erlang,map_get,_,_}|_]}} =
  786: 	(catch map_get({1,1}, id(#{{1,1.0}=>"tuple"}))),
  787:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},[{erlang,map_get,_,_}|_]}} = (catch map_get(a, id(#{}))),
  788:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},[{erlang,map_get,_,_}|_]}} =
  789: 	(catch map_get(a, id(#{b=>1, c=>2}))),
  790: 
  791:     %% in guards
  792:     M2 = id(#{a=>1}),
  793:     true = if map_get(a, M2) =:= 1 -> true; true -> false end,
  794:     false = if map_get(x, M2) =:= 1 -> true; true -> false end,
  795:     do_badmap(fun
  796:         (T) when map_get(x, T) =:= 1 -> ok;
  797:         (T) -> false = is_map(T)
  798:     end),
  799: 
  800:     %% Test unions of maps with some other type.
  801: 
  802:     M3 = id(M2),
  803:     if
  804:         is_map(M3) -> ok;
  805:         is_atom(M3) -> ok
  806:     end,
  807:     %% M3 is now known to be either a map or an atom
  808:     1 = map_get(a, M3),
  809: 
  810:     M4 = id(M3),
  811:     if
  812:         is_map(M4) -> ok;
  813:         is_atom(M4) -> ok
  814:     end,
  815:     %% M4 is now known to be either a map or an atom
  816:     if
  817:         map_get(a, M4) =:= 1 -> ok
  818:     end,
  819: 
  820:     M5 = id(M4),
  821:     if
  822:         is_map(M5) -> ok;
  823:         is_tuple(M5) -> ok
  824:     end,
  825:     %% M5 is now known to be either a map or a tuple
  826:     1 = map_get(a, M5),
  827: 
  828:     M6 = id(M5),
  829:     if
  830:         is_map(M6) -> ok;
  831:         is_tuple(M6) -> ok
  832:     end,
  833:     %% M6 is now known to be either a map or a tuple
  834:     if
  835:         map_get(a, M6) =:= 1 -> ok
  836:     end,
  837: 
  838:     ok.
  839: 
  840: t_is_map_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  841:     %% small map
  842:     true = is_map_key(a, id(#{a=>1})),
  843:     true = is_map_key(b, id(#{a=>1, b=>2})),
  844:     true = is_map_key("hello", id(#{a=>1, "hello"=>"hi"})),
  845:     true = is_map_key({1,1.0}, id(#{a=>a, {1,1.0}=>"tuple hi"})),
  846: 
  847:     M0   = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
  848:     true = is_map_key(<<"k2">>, M0#{<<"k2">> => "v4"}),
  849: 
  850:     %% large map
  851:     M1   = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)] ++
  852: 			  [{a,1},{b,2},{"hello","hi"},{{1,1.0},"tuple hi"},
  853: 			   {k1,"v1"},{<<"k2">>,"v3"}]),
  854:     true = is_map_key(a, M1),
  855:     true = is_map_key(b, M1),
  856:     true = is_map_key("hello", M1),
  857:     true = is_map_key({1,1.0}, M1),
  858:     true = is_map_key(<<"k2">>, M1),
  859: 
  860:     true = is_map_key(id(a), M1),
  861:     true = is_map_key(id("hello"), M1),
  862: 
  863:     %% error cases
  864:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
  865: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{erlang,is_map_key,_,_}|_]}} =
  866: 			  (catch is_map_key(a, T))
  867: 	      end),
  868: 
  869:     false = is_map_key({1,1}, id(#{{1,1.0}=>"tuple"})),
  870:     false = is_map_key(a, id(#{})),
  871:     false = is_map_key(a, id(#{b=>1, c=>2})),
  872: 
  873:     %% in guards
  874:     M2 = id(#{a=>1}),
  875:     true = if is_map_key(a, M2) -> true; true -> false end,
  876:     false = if is_map_key(x, M2) -> true; true -> false end,
  877:     do_badmap(fun
  878:         (T) when is_map_key(T, x) =:= 1 -> ok;
  879:         (T) -> false = is_map(T)
  880:     end),
  881:     ok.
  882: 
  883: build_and_check_size([K|Ks],N,M0) ->
  884:     N = map_size(M0),
  885:     M1 = M0#{ K => K },
  886:     build_and_check_size(Ks,N + 1,M1);
  887: build_and_check_size([],N,M) ->
  888:     N = map_size(M),
  889:     ok.
  890: 
  891: map_is_size(M,N) when map_size(M) =:= N -> true;
  892: map_is_size(_,_) -> false.
  893: 
  894: t_is_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  895:     true = is_map(#{}),
  896:     true = is_map(#{a=>1}),
  897:     false = is_map({a,b}),
  898:     false = is_map(x),
  899:     if is_map(#{}) -> ok end,
  900:     if is_map(#{b=>1}) -> ok end,
  901:     if not is_map([1,2,3]) -> ok end,
  902:     if not is_map(x) -> ok end,
  903:     ok.
  904: 
  905: % test map updates without matching
  906: t_update_literals_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

  964: t_update_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  965:     Map = #{x=>1,y=>2,z=>3,q=>4},

  972: loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, []) -> Map;
  973: loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, [{X,Q}|Vs]) ->
  974:     loop_update_literals_x_q(Map#{q=>Q,x=>X},Vs).

  981: 	    {1,2},{3,4},{5,6},{7,8}
  982: 	]),

  986:     M2 = M1#{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
  987: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
  988:     M0 = M2,
  989: 
  990:     #{ 4 := another_number, int := 3 } = M2#{ 4 => another_number },
  991:     ok.

 1062: loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(Map, []) -> Map;
 1063: loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(#{ q:=Q0, x:=X0,
 1064:                                      #{ "one" => small, map => key } := "small map key 1" } = Map, [{X,Q}|Vs]) ->
 1065:     loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(Map#{q=>Q0+Q,x=>X0+X},Vs).

 1067: 
 1068: t_update_map_expressions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1069:     M = maps:new(),
 1070:     #{ a := 1 } = M#{a => 1},
 1071: 
 1072:     #{ b := 2 } = (maps:new())#{ b => 2 },
 1073: 
 1074:     #{ a :=42, b:=42, c:=42 } = (maps:from_list([{a,1},{b,2},{c,3}]))#{ a := 42, b := 42, c := 42 },
 1075:     #{ "a" :=1, "b":=42, "c":=42 } = (maps:from_list([{"a",1},{"b",2}]))#{ "b" := 42, "c" => 42 },
 1076:     Ks = lists:seq($a,$z),
 1077:     #{ "aa" := {$a,$a}, "ac":=41, "dc":=42 } =
 1078:         (maps:from_list([{[K1,K2],{K1,K2}}|| K1 <- Ks, K2 <- Ks]))#{ "ac" := 41, "dc" => 42 },
 1079: 
 1080:     %% Error cases.
 1081:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1082: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 1083: 			  (catch (T)#{a:=42,b=>2})
 1084: 	      end),
 1085:     ok.
 1086: 
 1087: t_update_assoc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1088:     M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e}),
 1089: 
 1090:     M1 = M0#{1=>42,2=>100,4=>[a,b,c]},
 1091:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1092:     #{1:=42,2:=b,4:=d,5:=e,2.0:=100,3.0:=c,4.0:=[a,b,c]} = M0#{1.0=>float,1:=42,2.0=>wrong,2.0=>100,4.0=>[a,b,c]},
 1093: 
 1094:     M2 = M0#{3.0=>new},
 1095:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3.0:=new,4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 1096:     M2 = M0#{3.0:=wrong,3.0=>new},
 1097: 
 1098:     %% Errors cases.
 1099:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1100: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 1101: 			  (catch T#{nonexisting=>val})
 1102: 	      end),
 1103:     ok.
 1104: 
 1105:

 1171: t_update_assoc_sharing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1172:     Complex = id(#{nested=>map}),
 1173: 
 1174:     case erlang:system_info(debug_compiled) of
 1175:         true ->
 1176:             %% the maximum size of a flatmap in a debug-compiled
 1177:             %% system is three
 1178:             M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,complex=>Complex}),
 1179: 
 1180:             %% all keys & values are the same
 1181:             M1 = M0#{1=>a,complex=>Complex},
 1182:             true = erts_debug:same(M1, M0),
 1183:             M1 = M0,
 1184: 
 1185:             %% only keys are the same
 1186:             M2 = M0#{1=>new_value,complex=>Complex#{extra=>key}},
 1187:             true = same_keys(M0, M2);
 1188:         false ->
 1189:             M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e,complex=>Complex}),
 1190: 
 1191:             %% all keys & values are the same
 1192:             M1 = M0#{1=>a,complex=>Complex},
 1193:             true = erts_debug:same(M1, M0),
 1194:             M1 = M0,
 1195: 
 1196:             %% only keys are the same
 1197:             M2 = M0#{1=>new_value,complex=>Complex#{extra=>key}},
 1198:             true = same_keys(M0, M2),
 1199: 
 1200:             M3 = M0#{2=>new_value},
 1201:             true = same_keys(M0, M3),
 1202:             #{2:=new_value} = M3,
 1203: 
 1204:             M4 = M0#{1=>1,2=>2,3.0=>3,4=>4,5=>5,complex=>6},
 1205:             true = same_keys(M0, M4),
 1206:             #{1:=1,2:=2,3.0:=3,4:=4,5:=5,complex:=6} = M4
 1207:     end,
 1208: 
 1209:     ok.
 1210: 
 1211: same_keys(M0, M1) ->
 1212:     Keys0 = erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(M0),
 1213:     Keys1 = erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(M1),
 1214:     erts_debug:same(Keys0, Keys1).
 1215: 
 1216: t_update_exact(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1217:     M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e}),
 1218: 
 1219:     M1 = M0#{1:=42,2:=100,4:=[a,b,c]},
 1220:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1221:     M1 = M0#{1:=wrong,1=>42,2=>wrong,2:=100,4:=[a,b,c]},
 1222: 
 1223:     M2 = M0#{3.0:=new},
 1224:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3.0:=new,4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 1225:     M2 = M0#{3.0=>wrong,3.0:=new},
 1226:     true = M2 =/= M0#{3=>right,3.0:=new},
 1227:     #{ 3 := right, 3.0 := new } = M0#{3=>right,3.0:=new},
 1228: 
 1229:     M3 = id(#{ 1 => val}),
 1230:     #{1 := update2,1.0 := new_val4} = M3#{
 1231: 	1.0 => new_val1, 1 := update, 1=> update3,
 1232: 	1 := update2, 1.0 := new_val2, 1.0 => new_val3,
 1233: 	1.0 => new_val4 },
 1234: 
 1235:     %% Errors cases.
 1236:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 1237: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 1238: 			  (catch T#{nonexisting=>val})
 1239: 	      end),
 1240:     Empty = id(#{}),
 1241:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,nonexisting},_}} = (catch Empty#{nonexisting:=val}),
 1242:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,nonexisting},_}} = (catch M0#{nonexisting:=val}),
 1243:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,1.0},_}} = (catch M0#{1.0:=v,1.0=>v2}),
 1244:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42},_}} = (catch M0#{42.0:=v,42:=v2}),
 1245:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42.0},_}} = (catch M0#{42=>v1,42.0:=v2,42:=v3}),
 1246: 
 1247:     ok.
 1248:

 1331: t_update_deep(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1332:     N = 250000,
 1333:     M0 = maps:from_list([{integer_to_list(I),a}||I<-lists:seq(1,N)]),
 1334:     #{ "1" := a, "10" := a, "100" := a, "1000" := a, "10000" := a } = M0,
 1335: 
 1336:     M1 = M0#{ "1" := b, "10" := b, "100" := b, "1000" := b, "10000" := b },
 1337:     #{ "1" := a, "10" := a, "100" := a, "1000" := a, "10000" := a } = M0,
 1338:     #{ "1" := b, "10" := b, "100" := b, "1000" := b, "10000" := b } = M1,
 1339: 
 1340:     M2 = M0#{ "1" => c, "10" => c, "100" => c, "1000" => c, "10000" => c },
 1341:     #{ "1" := a, "10" := a, "100" := a, "1000" := a, "10000" := a } = M0,
 1342:     #{ "1" := b, "10" := b, "100" := b, "1000" := b, "10000" := b } = M1,
 1343:     #{ "1" := c, "10" := c, "100" := c, "1000" := c, "10000" := c } = M2,
 1344: 
 1345:     M3 = M2#{ "n1" => d, "n10" => d, "n100" => d, "n1000" => d, "n10000" => d },
 1346:     #{  "1" := a,  "10" := a,  "100" := a,  "1000" := a,  "10000" := a } = M0,
 1347:     #{  "1" := b,  "10" := b,  "100" := b,  "1000" := b,  "10000" := b } = M1,
 1348:     #{  "1" := c,  "10" := c,  "100" := c,  "1000" := c,  "10000" := c } = M2,
 1349:     #{  "1" := c,  "10" := c,  "100" := c,  "1000" := c,  "10000" := c } = M3,
 1350:     #{ "n1" := d, "n10" := d, "n100" := d, "n1000" := d, "n10000" := d } = M3,
 1351:     ok.
 1352: 
 1353: t_guard_bifs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1354:     true   = map_guard_head(#{a=>1}),
 1355:     false  = map_guard_head([]),
 1356:     true   = map_guard_body(#{a=>1}),
 1357:     false  = map_guard_body({}),
 1358:     true   = map_guard_pattern(#{a=>1, <<"hi">> => "hi" }),
 1359:     false  = map_guard_pattern("list"),
 1360:     ok.
 1361: 
 1362: map_guard_head(M) when is_map(M) -> true;
 1363: map_guard_head(_) -> false.
 1364: 
 1365: map_guard_body(M) -> is_map(M).
 1366: 
 1367: map_guard_pattern(#{}) -> true;
 1368: map_guard_pattern(_)   -> false.
 1369: 
 1370: t_guard_sequence(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1371: 	{1, "a"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>1,val=>id("a")}),
 1372: 	{2, "b"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>2,val=>id("b")}),
 1373: 	{3, "c"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>3,val=>id("c")}),
 1374: 	{4, "d"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>4,val=>id("d")}),
 1375: 	{5, "e"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>5,val=>id("e")}),
 1376: 
 1377: 	{1,M1}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M1 = id(#{a=>3})),
 1378: 	{2,M2}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M2 = id(#{a=>4, b=>4})),
 1379: 	{3,gg,M3}    = map_guard_sequence_2(M3 = id(#{a=>gg, b=>4})),
 1380: 	{4,sc,sc,M4} = map_guard_sequence_2(M4 = id(#{a=>sc, b=>3, c=>sc2})),
 1381: 	{5,kk,kk,M5} = map_guard_sequence_2(M5 = id(#{a=>kk, b=>other, c=>sc2})),
 1382: 
 1383: 	%% error case
 1384: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>6,val=>id("e")})),
 1385: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_2(#{b=>5})),
 1386: 	ok.
 1387:

 1442: 	{2, "b"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>2,val=>id("b")}),
 1443: 	{3, "c"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>3,val=>id("c")}),
 1444: 	{4, "d"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>4,val=>id("d")}),
 1445: 	{5, "e"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>5,val=>id("e")}),
 1446: 
 1447: 	{1,M1}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M1 = id(M0#{a=>3})),
 1448: 	{2,M2}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M2 = id(M0#{a=>4, b=>4})),
 1449: 	{3,gg,M3}    = map_guard_sequence_2(M3 = id(M0#{a=>gg, b=>4})),
 1450: 	{4,sc,sc,M4} = map_guard_sequence_2(M4 = id(M0#{a=>sc, b=>3, c=>sc2})),
 1451: 	{5,kk,kk,M5} = map_guard_sequence_2(M5 = id(M0#{a=>kk, b=>other, c=>sc2})),
 1452: 
 1453: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>6,val=>id("e")})),
 1454: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_2(M0#{b=>5})),
 1455:         ok.
 1456: 
 1457: 
 1458: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=1=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1459: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=2=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1460: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=3=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1461: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=4=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1462: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=5=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val}.
 1463: 
 1464: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=3 }=M) -> {1, M};
 1465: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=4 }=M) -> {2, M};
 1466: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=X, b:=4 }=M) -> {3,X,M};
 1467: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=Y, b:=3 }=M) when X =:= Y -> {4,X,Y,M};
 1468: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=Y }=M) when X =:= Y -> {5,X,Y,M}.
 1469: 
 1470: 
 1471: t_guard_update(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1472:     error  = map_guard_update(#{},#{}),
 1473:     first  = map_guard_update(#{}, #{x=>first}),
 1474:     second = map_guard_update(#{y=>old}, #{x=>second,y=>old}),
 1475:     ok.
 1476: 
 1477: t_guard_update_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1478:     M0 = id(#{ 70=>a0,80=>b0,90=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00",03]}=>"10",
 1479:                71=>a1,81=>b1,91=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01",03]}=>"11",
 1480:                72=>a2,82=>b2,92=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02",03]}=>"12",
 1481:                73=>a3,83=>b3,93=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03",03]}=>"13",
 1482:                74=>a4,84=>b4,94=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04",03]}=>"14",
 1483: 
 1484:                75=>a5,85=>b5,95=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05",03]}=>"15",
 1485:                76=>a6,86=>b6,96=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06",03]}=>"16",
 1486:                77=>a7,87=>b7,97=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07",03]}=>"17",
 1487:                78=>a8,88=>b8,98=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08",03]}=>"18",
 1488:                79=>a9,89=>b9,99=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09",03]}=>"19",
 1489: 
 1490:                70.0=>fa0,80.0=>fb0,90.0=>"fc0",
 1491:                71.0=>fa1,81.0=>fb1,91.0=>"fc1",
 1492:                72.0=>fa2,82.0=>fb2,92.0=>"fc2",
 1493:                73.0=>fa3,83.0=>fb3,93.0=>"fc3",
 1494:                74.0=>fa4,84.0=>fb4,94.0=>"fc4",
 1495: 
 1496:                75.0=>fa5,85.0=>fb5,95.0=>"fc5",
 1497:                76.0=>fa6,86.0=>fb6,96.0=>"fc6",
 1498:                77.0=>fa7,87.0=>fb7,97.0=>"fc7",
 1499:                78.0=>fa8,88.0=>fb8,98.0=>"fc8",
 1500:                79.0=>fa9,89.0=>fb9,99.0=>"fc9",
 1501: 
 1502:                #{ one => small, map => key } => "small map key 1",
 1503:                #{ second => small, map => key } => "small map key 2",
 1504:                #{ third => small, map => key } => "small map key 3",
 1505: 
 1506:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1507:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1508:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1509:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1510:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1511: 
 1512:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1513:                   16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1514:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1515:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1516:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
 1517: 
 1518:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1519:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1520:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1521:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1522:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1523: 
 1524:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1525:                   k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1526:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1527:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1528:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 2" }),
 1529: 
 1530: 
 1531:     error  = map_guard_update(M0#{},M0#{}),
 1532:     first  = map_guard_update(M0#{},M0#{x=>first}),
 1533:     second = map_guard_update(M0#{y=>old}, M0#{x=>second,y=>old}),
 1534:     ok.
 1535: 
 1536: 
 1537: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x=>first}  =:= M2 -> first;
 1538: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x=>second} =:= M2 -> second;
 1539: map_guard_update(_, _) -> error.
 1540: 
 1541: t_guard_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1542:     M0  = #{ id => 0 },
 1543:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> guard_receive_loop() end),
 1544:     Big = 36893488147419103229,
 1545:     B1  = <<"some text">>,
 1546:     B2  = <<"was appended">>,
 1547:     B3  = <<B1/binary, B2/binary>>,
 1548: 
 1549:     #{id:=1, res:=Big} = M1 = call(Pid, M0#{op=>sub,in=>{1 bsl 65, 3}}),
 1550:     #{id:=2, res:=26}  = M2 = call(Pid, M1#{op=>idiv,in=>{53,2}}),
 1551:     #{id:=3, res:=832} = M3 = call(Pid, M2#{op=>imul,in=>{26,32}}),
 1552:     #{id:=4, res:=4}   = M4 = call(Pid, M3#{op=>add,in=>{1,3}}),
 1553:     #{id:=5, res:=Big} = M5 = call(Pid, M4#{op=>sub,in=>{1 bsl 65, 3}}),
 1554:     #{id:=6, res:=B3}  = M6 = call(Pid, M5#{op=>"append",in=>{B1,B2}}),
 1555:     #{id:=7, res:=4}   = _  = call(Pid, M6#{op=>add,in=>{1,3}}),
 1556: 
 1557: 
 1558:     %% update old maps and check id update
 1559:     #{id:=2, res:=B3} = call(Pid, M1#{op=>"append",in=>{B1,B2}}),
 1560:     #{id:=5, res:=99} = call(Pid, M4#{op=>add,in=>{33, 66}}),
 1561: 
 1562:     %% cleanup
 1563:     done = call(Pid, done),
 1564:     ok.
 1565: 
 1566: -define(t_guard_receive_large_procs, 1500).
 1567: 
 1568: t_guard_receive_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1569:     M = lists:foldl(fun(_,#{procs := Ps } = M) ->
 1570:                             M#{ procs := Ps#{ spawn_link(fun() -> grecv_loop() end) => 0 }}
 1571:                     end, #{procs => #{}, done => 0}, lists:seq(1,?t_guard_receive_large_procs)),
 1572:     lists:foreach(fun(Pid) ->
 1573:                           Pid ! {self(), hello}
 1574:                   end, maps:keys(maps:get(procs,M))),
 1575:     ok = guard_receive_large_loop(M),
 1576:     ok.
 1577: 
 1578: guard_receive_large_loop(#{done := ?t_guard_receive_large_procs}) ->
 1579:     ok;
 1580: guard_receive_large_loop(M) ->
 1581:     receive
 1582:         #{pid := Pid, msg := hello} ->
 1583:             case M of
 1584:                 #{done := Count, procs := #{Pid := 150}} ->
 1585:                     Pid ! {self(), done},
 1586:                     guard_receive_large_loop(M#{done := Count + 1});
 1587:                 #{procs := #{Pid := Count} = Ps} ->
 1588:                     Pid ! {self(), hello},
 1589:                     guard_receive_large_loop(M#{procs := Ps#{Pid := Count + 1}})
 1590:             end
 1591:     end.
 1592: 
 1593: grecv_loop() ->
 1594:     receive
 1595:         {_, done} ->
 1596:             ok;
 1597:         {Pid, hello} ->
 1598:             Pid ! #{pid=>self(), msg=>hello},
 1599:             grecv_loop()
 1600:     end.
 1601: 
 1602: call(Pid, M) ->
 1603:     Pid ! {self(), M}, receive {Pid, Res} -> Res end.
 1604: 
 1605: guard_receive_loop() ->
 1606:     receive
 1607: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:="append", in:={X,Y}}=M} when is_binary(X), is_binary(Y) ->
 1608: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=><<X/binary,Y/binary>>}},
 1609: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1610: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=add, in:={X,Y}}} ->
 1611: 	    Pid ! {self(), #{ id=>Id+1, res=>X+Y}},
 1612: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1613: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=sub,  in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1614: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X-Y}},
 1615: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1616: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=idiv, in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1617: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X div Y}},
 1618: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1619: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=imul, in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1620: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X * Y}},
 1621: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1622: 	{Pid, done} ->
 1623: 	    Pid ! {self(), done};
 1624: 	{Pid, Other} ->
 1625: 	    Pid ! {error, Other},
 1626: 	    guard_receive_loop()
 1627:     end.
 1628: 
 1629: 
 1630: t_list_comprehension(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1631:     [#{k:=1},#{k:=2},#{k:=3}] = [#{k=>I} || I <- [1,2,3]],
 1632: 
 1633:     Ks = lists:seq($a,$z),
 1634:     Ms = [#{[K1,K2]=>{K1,K2}} || K1 <- Ks, K2 <- Ks],
 1635:     [#{"aa" := {$a,$a}},#{"ab":={$a,$b}}|_] = Ms,
 1636:     [#{"zz" := {$z,$z}},#{"zy":={$z,$y}}|_] = lists:reverse(Ms),
 1637:     ok.
 1638: 
 1639: t_guard_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1640:     F1 = fun
 1641: 	    (#{s:=v,v:=V})     -> {v,V};
 1642: 	    (#{s:=t,v:={V,V}}) -> {t,V};
 1643: 	    (#{s:=l,v:=[V,V]}) -> {l,V}
 1644:     end,
 1645:     
 1646:     F2 = fun
 1647: 	    (#{s:=T,v:={V,V}}) -> {T,V};
 1648: 	    (#{s:=T,v:=[V,V]}) -> {T,V};
 1649: 	    (#{s:=T,v:=V})     -> {T,V}
 1650:     end,
 1651:     V = <<"hi">>,
 1652: 
 1653:     {v,V} = F1(#{s=>v,v=>V}),
 1654:     {t,V} = F1(#{s=>t,v=>{V,V}}),
 1655:     {l,V} = F1(#{s=>l,v=>[V,V]}),
 1656: 
 1657:     {v,V} = F2(#{s=>v,v=>V}),
 1658:     {t,V} = F2(#{s=>t,v=>{V,V}}),
 1659:     {l,V} = F2(#{s=>l,v=>[V,V]}),
 1660: 
 1661:     %% error case
 1662:     {'EXIT', {function_clause,[{?MODULE,_,[#{s:=none,v:=none}],_}|_]}} = (catch F1(#{s=>none,v=>none})),
 1663:     ok.
 1664: 
 1665: 
 1666: t_map_sort_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1667:     % test relation
 1668: 
 1669:     %% size order
 1670:     true  = #{ a => 1, b => 2} < id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1671:     true  = #{ b => 1, a => 1} < id(#{ c => 1, a => 1, b => 1}),
 1672:     false = #{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1} < id(#{ c => 1, a => 1}),
 1673: 
 1674:     %% key order
 1675:     true  = #{ a => 1 } < id(#{ b => 1}),
 1676:     false = #{ b => 1 } < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1677:     true  = #{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1 } < id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1678:     true  = #{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1 } > id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1679:     true  = #{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1 } < id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1680:     true  = #{ "a" => 1 } < id(#{ <<"a">> => 1}),
 1681:     false = #{ <<"a">> => 1 } < id(#{ "a" => 1}),
 1682:     true  = #{ 1 => 1 } < id(#{ 1.0 => 1}),
 1683:     false = #{ 1.0 => 1 } < id(#{ 1 => 1}),
 1684: 
 1685:     %% value order
 1686:     true  = #{ a => 1 } < id(#{ a => 2}),
 1687:     false = #{ a => 2 } < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1688:     false = #{ a => 2, b => 1 } < id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1689:     true  = #{ a => 1, b => 1 } < id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1690:     false = #{ a => 1 } < id(#{ a => 1.0}),
 1691:     false = #{ a => 1.0 } < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1692: 
 1693:     true  = #{ "a" => "hi", b => 134 } == id(#{ b => 134,"a" => "hi"}),
 1694: 
 1695:     %% large maps
 1696: 
 1697:     M = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I <- lists:seq(1,500)]),
 1698: 
 1699:     %% size order
 1700:     true  = M#{ a => 1, b => 2} < id(M#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1701:     true  = M#{ b => 1, a => 1} < id(M#{ c => 1, a => 1, b => 1}),
 1702:     false = M#{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1} < id(M#{ c => 1, a => 1}),
 1703: 
 1704:     %% key order
 1705:     true  = M#{ a => 1 } < id(M#{ b => 1}),
 1706:     false = M#{ b => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 1}),
 1707:     true  = M#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1 } < id(M#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1708:     true  = M#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1 } > id(M#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1709:     true  = M#{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1 } < id(M#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1710:     true  = M#{ "a" => 1 } < id(M#{ <<"a">> => 1}),
 1711:     false = M#{ <<"a">> => 1 } < id(#{ "a" => 1}),
 1712:     true  = M#{ 1 => 1 } < id(maps:remove(1,M#{ 1.0 => 1})),
 1713:     false = M#{ 1.0 => 1 } < id(M#{ 1 => 1}),
 1714: 
 1715:     %% value order
 1716:     true  = M#{ a => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 2}),
 1717:     false = M#{ a => 2 } < id(M#{ a => 1}),
 1718:     false = M#{ a => 2, b => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1719:     true  = M#{ a => 1, b => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1720:     false = M#{ a => 1 } < id(M#{ a => 1.0}),
 1721:     false = M#{ a => 1.0 } < id(M#{ a => 1}),
 1722: 
 1723:     true  = M#{ "a" => "hi", b => 134 } == id(M#{ b => 134,"a" => "hi"}),
 1724: 
 1725:     %% lists:sort
 1726: 
 1727:     SortVs = [#{"a"=>1},#{a=>2},#{1=>3},#{<<"a">>=>4}],
 1728:     [#{1:=ok},#{a:=ok},#{"a":=ok},#{<<"a">>:=ok}] = lists:sort([#{"a"=>ok},#{a=>ok},#{1=>ok},#{<<"a">>=>ok}]),
 1729:     [#{1:=3},#{a:=2},#{"a":=1},#{<<"a">>:=4}] = lists:sort(SortVs),
 1730:     [#{1:=3},#{a:=2},#{"a":=1},#{<<"a">>:=4}] = lists:sort(lists:reverse(SortVs)),
 1731:     ok.
 1732: 
 1733: t_map_equal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1734:     true  = id(#{}) =:= id(#{}),
 1735:     false = id(#{}) =:= id(#{a=>1}),
 1736:     false = id(#{a=>1}) =:= id(#{}),
 1737:     true  = id(#{ "a" => "hi", b => 134 }) =:= id(#{ b => 134,"a" => "hi"}),
 1738: 
 1739:     false = id(#{ a => 1 }) =:= id(#{ a => 2}),
 1740:     false = id(#{ a => 2 }) =:= id(#{ a => 1}),
 1741:     false = id(#{ a => 2, b => 1 }) =:= id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1742:     false = id(#{ a => 1, b => 1 }) =:= id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1743: 
 1744:     true = id(#{ a => 1 }) =:= id(#{ a => 1}),
 1745:     true = id(#{ "a" => 2 }) =:= id(#{ "a" => 2}),
 1746:     true = id(#{ "a" => 2, b => 3 }) =:= id(#{ "a" => 2, b => 3}),
 1747:     true = id(#{ a => 1, b => 3, c => <<"wat">> }) =:= id(#{ a => 1, b => 3, c=><<"wat">>}),
 1748:     ok.
 1749: 
 1750: 
 1751: t_map_compare(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1752:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 1753:     io:format("seed = ~p\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
 1754:     repeat(100, fun(_) -> float_int_compare() end, []),
 1755:     repeat(100, fun(_) -> recursive_compare() end, []),
 1756:     repeat(10, fun(_) -> atoms_compare() end, []),
 1757:     repeat(10, fun(_) -> atoms_plus_compare() end, []),
 1758:     ok.
 1759: 
 1760: float_int_compare() ->
 1761:     Terms = numeric_keys(3),
 1762:     %%io:format("Keys to use: ~p\n", [Terms]),
 1763:     Pairs = lists:map(fun(K) -> list_to_tuple([{K,V} || V <- Terms]) end, Terms),
 1764:     lists:foreach(fun(Size) ->
 1765: 			  MapGen = fun() -> map_gen(Pairs, Size) end,
 1766: 			  repeat(100, fun do_compare/1, [MapGen, MapGen])
 1767: 		  end,
 1768: 		  lists:seq(1,length(Terms))),
 1769:     ok.
 1770: 
 1771: atoms_compare() ->
 1772:     Atoms = [true, false, ok, '', ?MODULE, list_to_atom(id("a new atom"))],
 1773:     Pairs = lists:map(fun(K) -> list_to_tuple([{K,V} || V <- Atoms]) end,
 1774:                       Atoms),
 1775:     lists:foreach(
 1776:       fun(Size) ->
 1777:               M1 = map_gen(Pairs, Size),
 1778:               M2 = map_gen(Pairs, Size),
 1779:               %%io:format("Atom maps to compare: ~p AND ~p\n", [M1, M2]),
 1780:               do_cmp(M1, M2)
 1781:       end,
 1782:       lists:seq(1,length(Atoms))),
 1783:     ok.
 1784: 
 1785: atoms_plus_compare() ->
 1786:     Atoms = [true, false, ok, '', ?MODULE, list_to_atom(id("a new atom"))],
 1787:     Pairs = lists:map(fun(K) -> list_to_tuple([{K,V} || V <- Atoms]) end,
 1788:                       Atoms),
 1789:     Small = 17,
 1790:     Big1 = 1 bsl 64,
 1791:     Big2 = erts_debug:copy_shared(Big1),
 1792:     Float1 = float(Big1),
 1793:     Float2 = float(Big2),
 1794:     Others = {Small, -Small, Big1, -Big1, Big2, Float1, Float2,
 1795:               [], {}, #{}, self(), make_ref(),
 1796:               ok, yes, no, lists, maps, seq},
 1797:     RandOther = fun() -> element(rand:uniform(size(Others)), Others) end,
 1798: 
 1799:     lists:foreach(
 1800:       fun(Size) ->
 1801:               M = map_gen(Pairs, Size),
 1802:               M1 = M#{RandOther() => RandOther()},
 1803:               M2 = M#{RandOther() => RandOther()},
 1804:               %%io:format("Maps to compare:\nM1 = ~p\nM2 = ~p\n", [M1, M2]),
 1805:               do_cmp(M1, M2)
 1806:       end,
 1807:       lists:seq(1,length(Atoms))),
 1808:     ok.
 1809: 
 1810: numeric_keys(N) ->
 1811:     lists:foldl(fun(_,Acc) ->
 1812: 			Int = rand:uniform(N*4) - N*2,
 1813: 			Float = float(Int),
 1814: 			[Int, Float, Float * 0.99, Float * 1.01 | Acc]
 1815: 		end,
 1816: 		[],
 1817: 		lists:seq(1,N)).
 1818: 
 1819: 
 1820: repeat(0, _, _) ->
 1821:     ok;
 1822: repeat(N, Fun, Arg) ->
 1823:     Fun(Arg),
 1824:     repeat(N-1, Fun, Arg).
 1825: 
 1826: copy_term(T) ->
 1827:     Papa = self(),
 1828:     P = spawn_link(fun() -> receive Msg -> Papa ! Msg end end),
 1829:     P ! T,
 1830:     receive R -> R end.
 1831: 
 1832: do_compare([Gen1, Gen2]) ->
 1833:     M1 = Gen1(),
 1834:     M2 = Gen2(),
 1835:     %%io:format("Maps to compare: ~p AND ~p\n", [M1, M2]),
 1836:     C = (M1 < M2),
 1837:     Erlang = maps_lessthan(M1, M2),
 1838:     C = Erlang,
 1839:     ?CHECK(M1==M1, M1),
 1840: 
 1841:     %% Change one key from int to float (or vice versa) and check compare
 1842:     ML1 = maps:to_list(M1),
 1843:     {K1,V1} = lists:nth(rand:uniform(length(ML1)), ML1),
 1844:     case K1 of
 1845: 	I when is_integer(I) ->
 1846: 	    case maps:find(float(I),M1) of
 1847: 		error ->
 1848: 		    M1f = maps:remove(I, maps:put(float(I), V1, M1)),
 1849: 		    ?CHECK(M1f > M1, [M1f, M1]);
 1850: 		_ -> ok
 1851: 	    end;
 1852: 
 1853: 	F when is_float(F), round(F) == F ->
 1854: 	    case maps:find(round(F),M1) of
 1855: 		error ->
 1856: 		    M1i = maps:remove(F, maps:put(round(F), V1, M1)),
 1857: 		    ?CHECK(M1i < M1, [M1i, M1]);
 1858: 		_ -> ok
 1859: 	    end;
 1860: 
 1861: 	_ -> ok   % skip floats with decimals
 1862:     end,
 1863: 
 1864:     ?CHECK(M2 == M2, [M2]).
 1865: 
 1866: 
 1867: maps_lessthan(M1, M2) ->
 1868:   case {maps:size(M1),maps:size(M2)} of
 1869:       {S,S} ->
 1870: 	  {K1,V1} = lists:unzip(term_sort(maps:to_list(M1))),
 1871: 	  {K2,V2} = lists:unzip(term_sort(maps:to_list(M2))),
 1872: 
 1873: 	  case erts_internal:cmp_term(K1,K2) of
 1874: 	      -1 -> true;
 1875: 	      0 -> (V1 < V2);
 1876: 	      1 -> false
 1877: 	  end;
 1878: 
 1879:       {S1, S2} ->
 1880: 	  S1 < S2
 1881:   end.
 1882: 
 1883: term_sort(L) ->
 1884:     lists:sort(fun(A,B) -> erts_internal:cmp_term(A,B) =< 0 end,
 1885: 	       L).
 1886: 
 1887: 
 1888: cmp(T1, T2, Exact) when is_tuple(T1), is_tuple(T2) ->
 1889:     case {tuple_size(T1),tuple_size(T2)} of
 1890: 	{S,S} -> cmp(tuple_to_list(T1), tuple_to_list(T2), Exact);
 1891: 	{S1,S2} when S1 < S2 -> -1;
 1892: 	{S1,S2} when S1 > S2 -> 1
 1893:     end;
 1894: 
 1895: cmp([H1|T1], [H2|T2], Exact) ->
 1896:     case cmp(H1,H2, Exact) of
 1897: 	0 -> cmp(T1,T2, Exact);
 1898: 	C -> C
 1899:     end;
 1900: 
 1901: cmp(M1, M2, Exact) when is_map(M1) andalso is_map(M2) ->
 1902:     cmp_maps(M1,M2,Exact);
 1903: cmp(M1, M2, Exact) ->
 1904:     cmp_others(M1, M2, Exact).
 1905: 
 1906: cmp_maps(M1, M2, Exact) ->
 1907:     case {maps:size(M1),maps:size(M2)} of
 1908: 	{S,S} ->
 1909: 	    {K1,V1} = lists:unzip(cmp_key_sort(maps:to_list(M1))),
 1910: 	    {K2,V2} = lists:unzip(cmp_key_sort(maps:to_list(M2))),
 1911: 
 1912: 	    case cmp(K1, K2, true) of
 1913: 		0 -> cmp(V1, V2, Exact);
 1914: 		C -> C
 1915: 	    end;
 1916: 
 1917: 	{S1,S2} when S1 < S2 -> -1;
 1918: 	{S1,S2} when S1 > S2 -> 1
 1919:     end.
 1920: 
 1921: cmp_others(I, F, true) when is_integer(I), is_float(F) ->
 1922:     -1;
 1923: cmp_others(F, I, true) when is_float(F), is_integer(I) ->
 1924:     1;
 1925: cmp_others(A1, A2, Exact) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
 1926:     cmp_others(atom_to_list(A1), atom_to_list(A2), Exact);
 1927: cmp_others(T1, T2, _) ->
 1928:     case {T1<T2, T1==T2} of
 1929: 	{true,false} -> -1;
 1930: 	{false,true} -> 0;
 1931: 	{false,false} -> 1
 1932:     end.
 1933: 
 1934: cmp_key_sort(L) ->
 1935:     lists:sort(fun(A,B) -> cmp(A,B,true) =< 0 end,
 1936: 	       L).
 1937: 
 1938: map_gen(Pairs, Size) ->
 1939:     {_,L} = lists:foldl(fun(_, {Keys, Acc}) ->
 1940: 				KI = rand:uniform(size(Keys)),
 1941: 				K = element(KI,Keys),
 1942: 				KV = element(rand:uniform(size(K)), K),
 1943: 				{erlang:delete_element(KI,Keys), [KV | Acc]}
 1944: 			end,
 1945: 			{list_to_tuple(Pairs), []},
 1946: 			lists:seq(1,Size)),
 1947: 
 1948:     maps:from_list(L).
 1949: 
 1950: 
 1951: recursive_compare() ->
 1952:     Leafs = {atom, 17, 16.9, 17.1, [], self(), spawn(fun() -> ok end), make_ref(), make_ref()},
 1953:     {A, B} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, 0, 0),
 1954:     %%io:format("Recursive term A = ~p\n", [A]),
 1955:     %%io:format("Recursive term B = ~p\n", [B]),
 1956: 
 1957:     do_cmp(A, B),
 1958: 
 1959:     A2 = copy_term(A),
 1960:     ?CHECK(A == A2, {A,A2}),
 1961:     ?CHECK(0 =:= cmp(A, A2, false), {A,A2}),
 1962: 
 1963:     B2 = copy_term(B),
 1964:     ?CHECK(B == B2, {B,B2}),
 1965:     ?CHECK(0 =:= cmp(B, B2, false), {B,B2}),
 1966:     ok.
 1967: 
 1968: do_cmp(A, B) ->
 1969:     ?CHECK({true,false} =:=  case cmp(A, B, false) of
 1970: 				 -1 -> {A<B, A>=B};
 1971: 				 0 -> {A==B, A/=B};
 1972: 				 1 -> {A>B, A=<B}
 1973: 			     end,
 1974: 	   {A,B}).
 1975: 
 1976: %% Generate two terms {A,B} that may only differ
 1977: %% at float vs integer types.
 1978: term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth) ->
 1979:     MaxDepth = 10,
 1980:     Rnd = case {Flags, Depth} of
 1981: 	      {_, MaxDepth} -> % Only leafs
 1982: 		  rand:uniform(size(Leafs)) + 3;
 1983: 	      {0, 0} ->        % Only containers
 1984: 		  rand:uniform(3);
 1985: 	      {0,_} ->         % Anything
 1986: 		  rand:uniform(size(Leafs)+3)
 1987: 	  end,
 1988:     case Rnd of
 1989: 	1 -> % Make map
 1990: 	    Size = rand:uniform(size(Leafs)),
 1991: 	    lists:foldl(fun(_, {Acc1,Acc2}) ->
 1992: 				{K1,K2} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags,
 1993: 							     Depth+1),
 1994: 				{V1,V2} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth+1),
 1995: 				{maps:put(K1,V1, Acc1), maps:put(K2,V2, Acc2)}
 1996: 			end,
 1997: 			{maps:new(), maps:new()},
 1998: 			lists:seq(1,Size));
 1999: 	2 -> % Make cons
 2000: 	    {Car1,Car2} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth+1),
 2001: 	    {Cdr1,Cdr2} = term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth+1),
 2002: 	    {[Car1 | Cdr1], [Car2 | Cdr2]};
 2003: 	3 -> % Make tuple
 2004: 	    Size = rand:uniform(size(Leafs)),
 2005: 	    L = lists:map(fun(_) -> term_gen_recursive(Leafs, Flags, Depth+1) end,
 2006: 			  lists:seq(1,Size)),
 2007: 	    {L1, L2} = lists:unzip(L),
 2008: 	    {list_to_tuple(L1), list_to_tuple(L2)};
 2009: 
 2010: 	N -> % Make leaf
 2011: 	    case element(N-3, Leafs) of
 2012: 		I when is_integer(I) ->
 2013: 		    case rand:uniform(4) of
 2014: 			1 -> {I, float(I)};
 2015: 			2 -> {float(I), I};
 2016: 			_ -> {I,I}
 2017: 		    end;
 2018: 		T -> {T,T}
 2019: 	    end
 2020:     end.
 2021: 
 2022: 
 2023: %% BIFs
 2024: t_bif_map_get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2025:     %% small map
 2026:     1    = maps:get(a, #{ a=> 1}),
 2027:     2    = maps:get(b, #{ a=> 1, b => 2}),
 2028:     "hi" = maps:get("hello", #{ a=>1, "hello" => "hi"}),
 2029:     "tuple hi" = maps:get({1,1.0}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}),
 2030: 
 2031:     M0    = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
 2032:     "v4" = maps:get(<<"k2">>, M0#{<<"k2">> => "v4"}),
 2033: 
 2034:     %% large map
 2035:     M1   = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)] ++
 2036: 			  [{a,1},{b,2},{"hello","hi"},{{1,1.0},"tuple hi"},
 2037: 			   {k1,"v1"},{<<"k2">>,"v3"}]),
 2038:     1    = maps:get(a, M1),
 2039:     2    = maps:get(b, M1),
 2040:     "hi" = maps:get("hello", M1),
 2041:     "tuple hi" = maps:get({1,1.0}, M1),
 2042:     "v3" = maps:get(<<"k2">>, M1),
 2043: 
 2044:     %% error cases
 2045:     %%
 2046:     %% Note that the stack trace is ignored because the compiler may have
 2047:     %% rewritten maps:get/2 to map_get.
 2048:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2049: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 2050: 			  (catch maps:get(a, T))
 2051: 	      end),
 2052: 
 2053:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,{1,1}},_}} =
 2054: 	(catch maps:get({1,1}, #{{1,1.0} => "tuple"})),
 2055:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} = (catch maps:get(a, #{})),
 2056:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} =
 2057: 	(catch maps:get(a, #{b=>1, c=>2})),
 2058:     ok.
 2059: 
 2060: t_bif_map_find(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2061:     %% small map
 2062:     {ok, 1}     = maps:find(a, #{ a=> 1}),
 2063:     {ok, 2}     = maps:find(b, #{ a=> 1, b => 2}),
 2064:     {ok, "int"} = maps:find(1, #{ 1   => "int"}),
 2065:     {ok, "float"} = maps:find(1.0, #{ 1.0=> "float"}),
 2066: 
 2067:     {ok, "hi"} = maps:find("hello", #{ a=>1, "hello" => "hi"}),
 2068:     {ok, "tuple hi"} = maps:find({1,1.0}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}),
 2069: 
 2070:     M0 = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
 2071:     {ok, "v4"} = maps:find(<<"k2">>, M0#{ <<"k2">> => "v4" }),
 2072: 
 2073:     %% large map
 2074:     M1   = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-lists:seq(1,100)] ++
 2075: 			  [{a,1},{b,2},{"hello","hi"},{{1,1.0},"tuple hi"},
 2076: 			   {k1,"v1"},{<<"k2">>,"v3"}]),
 2077:     {ok, 1}    = maps:find(a, M1),
 2078:     {ok, 2}    = maps:find(b, M1),
 2079:     {ok, "hi"} = maps:find("hello", M1),
 2080:     {ok, "tuple hi"} = maps:find({1,1.0}, M1),
 2081:     {ok, "v3"} = maps:find(<<"k2">>, M1),
 2082: 
 2083:     %% error case
 2084:     error = maps:find(a,#{}),
 2085:     error = maps:find(a,#{b=>1, c=>2}),
 2086:     error = maps:find(1.0, #{ 1 => "int"}),
 2087:     error = maps:find(1, #{ 1.0  => "float"}),
 2088:     error = maps:find({1.0,1}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}), % reverse types in tuple key
 2089: 
 2090:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2091: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,find,_,_}|_]}} =
 2092: 			  (catch maps:find(a, T))
 2093: 	      end),
 2094:     ok.
 2095: 
 2096: 
 2097: t_bif_map_is_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2098:     M1 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>, 4 => number},
 2099: 
 2100:     true  = maps:is_key("hi", M1),
 2101:     true  = maps:is_key(int, M1),
 2102:     true  = maps:is_key(<<"key">>, M1),
 2103:     true  = maps:is_key(4, M1),
 2104: 
 2105:     false = maps:is_key(5, M1),
 2106:     false = maps:is_key(<<"key2">>, M1),
 2107:     false = maps:is_key("h", M1),
 2108:     false = maps:is_key("hello", M1),
 2109:     false = maps:is_key(atom, M1),
 2110:     false = maps:is_key(any, id(#{})),
 2111: 
 2112:     false = maps:is_key("hi", maps:remove("hi", M1)),
 2113:     true  = maps:is_key("hi", M1),
 2114:     true  = maps:is_key(1, maps:put(1, "number", M1)),
 2115:     false = maps:is_key(1.0, maps:put(1, "number", M1)),
 2116: 
 2117:     %% error case
 2118:     %%
 2119:     %% Note that the stack trace is ignored because the compiler may have
 2120:     %% rewritten maps:is_key/2 to is_map_key.
 2121:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2122: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},_}} =
 2123: 			  (catch maps:is_key(a, T))
 2124: 	      end),
 2125:     ok.
 2126: 
 2127: t_bif_map_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2128:     [] = maps:keys(#{}),
 2129: 
 2130:     [1,2,3,4,5] = lists:sort(maps:keys(#{ 1 => a, 2 => b, 3 => c, 4 => d, 5 => e})),
 2131:     [1,2,3,4,5] = lists:sort(maps:keys(#{ 4 => d, 5 => e, 1 => a, 2 => b, 3 => c})),
 2132: 
 2133:     % values in key order: [4,int,"hi",<<"key">>]
 2134:     M1 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>, 4 => number},
 2135:     [4,int,"hi",<<"key">>] = lists:sort(maps:keys(M1)),
 2136: 
 2137:     %% error case
 2138:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2139: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,keys,_,_}|_]}} =
 2140: 			  (catch maps:keys(T))
 2141: 	      end),
 2142:     ok.
 2143: 
 2144: t_bif_map_new(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2145:     #{} = maps:new(),
 2146:     0   = erlang:map_size(maps:new()),
 2147:     ok.
 2148: 
 2149: t_bif_map_merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2150:     0   = erlang:map_size(maps:merge(#{},#{})),
 2151: 
 2152:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2153: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2154:     merge_with_empty(M0),
 2155: 
 2156:     M1 = #{ "hi" => "hello again", float => 3.3, {1,2} => "tuple", 4 => integer },
 2157: 
 2158:     #{4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat, float := 3.3, int := 3,
 2159: 	{1,2} := "tuple", "hi" := "hello", <<"key">> := <<"value">>} = maps:merge(M1,M0),
 2160: 
 2161:     #{4 := integer, 18446744073709551629 := wat, float := 3.3, int := 3,
 2162: 	{1,2} := "tuple", "hi" := "hello again", <<"key">> := <<"value">>} = maps:merge(M0,M1),
 2163: 
 2164:     %% try deep collisions
 2165:     N  = 150000,
 2166:     Is = lists:seq(1,N),
 2167:     M2 = maps:from_list([{I,I}||I<-Is]),
 2168:     150000 = maps:size(M2),
 2169:     merge_with_empty(M2),
 2170:     M3 = maps:from_list([{<<I:32>>,I}||I<-Is]),
 2171:     150000 = maps:size(M3),
 2172:     M4 = maps:merge(M2,M3),
 2173:     300000 = maps:size(M4),
 2174:     M5 = maps:from_list([{integer_to_list(I),I}||I<-Is]),
 2175:     150000 = maps:size(M5),
 2176:     M6 = maps:merge(M4,M5),
 2177:     450000 = maps:size(M6),
 2178:     M7 = maps:from_list([{float(I),I}||I<-Is]),
 2179:     150000 = maps:size(M7),
 2180:     M8 = maps:merge(M7,M6),
 2181:     600000 = maps:size(M8),
 2182: 
 2183:     #{      1 := 1,           "1" := 1,           <<1:32>> := 1      } = M8,
 2184:     #{     10 := 10,         "10" := 10,         <<10:32>> := 10     } = M8,
 2185:     #{    100 := 100,       "100" := 100,       <<100:32>> := 100    } = M8,
 2186:     #{   1000 := 1000,     "1000" := 1000,     <<1000:32>> := 1000   } = M8,
 2187:     #{  10000 := 10000,   "10000" := 10000,   <<10000:32>> := 10000  } = M8,
 2188:     #{ 100000 := 100000, "100000" := 100000, <<100000:32>> := 100000 } = M8,
 2189: 
 2190:     %% overlapping
 2191:     M8 = maps:merge(M2,M8),
 2192:     M8 = maps:merge(M3,M8),
 2193:     M8 = maps:merge(M4,M8),
 2194:     M8 = maps:merge(M5,M8),
 2195:     M8 = maps:merge(M6,M8),
 2196:     M8 = maps:merge(M7,M8),
 2197:     M8 = maps:merge(M8,M8),
 2198: 
 2199:     %% maps:merge/2 and mixed
 2200: 
 2201:     Ks1 = [764492191,2361333849], %% deep collision
 2202:     Ks2 = lists:seq(1,33),
 2203:     M9  = maps:from_list([{K,K}||K <- Ks1]),
 2204:     M10 = maps:from_list([{K,K}||K <- Ks2]),
 2205:     M11 = maps:merge(M9,M10),
 2206:     ok = check_keys_exist(Ks1 ++ Ks2, M11),
 2207: 
 2208:     %% Verify map and/or key tuple reuse
 2209: 
 2210:     MS = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>},
 2211:     merge_with_empty(MS),
 2212:     MS_keys = erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(MS),
 2213: 
 2214:     %% key tuple reuse
 2215:     MS_a = maps:merge(MS, #{int => 4}),
 2216:     true = erts_debug:same(erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(MS_a), MS_keys),
 2217:     %% map reuse
 2218:     MS_b = maps:merge(#{int => 4}, MS),
 2219:     true = erts_debug:same(MS_b, MS),
 2220: 
 2221:     %% mutated map reuse with literal key tuple
 2222:     MS_c = maps:put(int, 4, maps:remove(int, MS)),
 2223:     false = erts_debug:same(erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(MS_c), MS_keys),
 2224:     MS_cc = maps:merge(MS, MS_c),
 2225:     true = erts_debug:same(MS_cc, MS_c),
 2226:     %% not only do we reuse MS_c, it has mutated to use the literal keys of MS
 2227:     true = erts_debug:same(erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(MS_c), MS_keys),
 2228: 
 2229:     MS_d = maps:merge(MS_c, MS),
 2230:     true = erts_debug:same(MS_d, MS),
 2231: 
 2232:     %% error case
 2233:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2234: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2235: 			  (catch maps:merge(#{}, T)),
 2236: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2237: 			  (catch maps:merge(T, #{})),
 2238: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2239: 			  (catch maps:merge(M11, T)),
 2240: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2241: 			  (catch maps:merge(T, M11)),
 2242: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,merge,_,_}|_]}} =
 2243: 			  (catch maps:merge(T, T))
 2244: 	      end),
 2245:     ok.
 2246: 
 2247: merge_with_empty(M0) ->
 2248:     M0_1 = maps:merge(#{}, M0),
 2249:     M0 = M0_1,
 2250:     true = erts_debug:same(M0, M0_1),
 2251: 
 2252:     M0_2 = maps:merge(M0, #{}),
 2253:     M0 = M0_2,
 2254:     true = erts_debug:same(M0, M0_2),
 2255:     ok.
 2256: 
 2257: t_bif_map_put(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2258:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2259: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2260: 
 2261:     M1 = #{ "hi" := "hello"} = maps:put("hi", "hello", #{}),
 2262: 
 2263:     true = is_members(["hi"],maps:keys(M1)),
 2264:     true = is_members(["hello"],maps:values(M1)),
 2265: 
 2266:     M2 = #{ int := 3 } = maps:put(int, 3, M1),
 2267: 
 2268:     true = is_members([int,"hi"],maps:keys(M2)),
 2269:     true = is_members([3,"hello"],maps:values(M2)),
 2270: 
 2271:     M3 = #{ <<"key">> := <<"value">> } = maps:put(<<"key">>, <<"value">>, M2),
 2272: 
 2273:     true = is_members([int,"hi",<<"key">>],maps:keys(M3)),
 2274:     true = is_members([3,"hello",<<"value">>],maps:values(M3)),
 2275: 
 2276:     M4 = #{ 18446744073709551629 := wat } = maps:put(18446744073709551629, wat, M3),
 2277: 
 2278:     true = is_members([18446744073709551629,int,"hi",<<"key">>],maps:keys(M4)),
 2279:     true = is_members([wat,3,"hello",<<"value">>],maps:values(M4)),
 2280: 
 2281:     M0 = #{ 4 := number } = M5 = maps:put(4, number, M4),
 2282: 
 2283:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,int,"hi",<<"key">>],maps:keys(M5)),
 2284:     true = is_members([number,wat,3,"hello",<<"value">>],maps:values(M5)),
 2285: 
 2286:     M6 = #{ <<"key">> := <<"other value">> } = maps:put(<<"key">>, <<"other value">>, M5),
 2287: 
 2288:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,int,"hi",<<"key">>],maps:keys(M6)),
 2289:     true = is_members([number,wat,3,"hello",<<"other value">>],maps:values(M6)),
 2290: 
 2291:     %% error case
 2292:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2293: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,put,_,_}|_]}} =
 2294: 			  (catch maps:put(1, a, T))
 2295: 	      end),
 2296:     ok.
 2297: 
 2298: is_members(Ks,Ls) when length(Ks) =/= length(Ls) -> false;
 2299: is_members(Ks,Ls) -> is_members_do(Ks,Ls).
 2300: 
 2301: is_members_do([],[]) -> true;
 2302: is_members_do([],_) -> false;
 2303: is_members_do([K|Ks],Ls) ->
 2304:     is_members_do(Ks, lists:delete(K,Ls)).
 2305: 
 2306: t_bif_map_remove(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2307:     0  = erlang:map_size(maps:remove(some_key, #{})),
 2308: 
 2309:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2310:             4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2311: 
 2312:     M1 = maps:remove("hi", M0),
 2313:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,int,<<"key">>],maps:keys(M1)),
 2314:     true = is_members([number,wat,3,<<"value">>],maps:values(M1)),
 2315: 
 2316:     M2 = maps:remove(int, M1),
 2317:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,<<"key">>],maps:keys(M2)),
 2318:     true = is_members([number,wat,<<"value">>],maps:values(M2)),
 2319: 
 2320:     M3 = maps:remove(<<"key">>, M2),
 2321:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629],maps:keys(M3)),
 2322:     true = is_members([number,wat],maps:values(M3)),
 2323: 
 2324:     M4 = maps:remove(18446744073709551629, M3),
 2325:     true = is_members([4],maps:keys(M4)),
 2326:     true = is_members([number],maps:values(M4)),
 2327: 
 2328:     M5 = maps:remove(4, M4),
 2329:     [] = maps:keys(M5),
 2330:     [] = maps:values(M5),
 2331: 
 2332:     M0 = maps:remove(5,M0),
 2333:     M0 = maps:remove("hi there",M0),
 2334: 
 2335:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, 4 := number} = maps:remove(18446744073709551629,maps:remove(<<"key">>,M0)),
 2336: 
 2337:     %% error case
 2338:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2339: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,remove,_,_}|_]}} = (catch maps:remove(a, T))
 2340: 	      end),
 2341:     ok.

 2343: t_bif_map_take(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2344:     error = maps:take(some_key, #{}),
 2345: 
 2346:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2347:             4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2348: 
 2349:     5 = maps:size(M0),
 2350:     {"hello", M1} = maps:take("hi", M0),

 2352:     true = is_members([number,wat,3,<<"value">>],maps:values(M1)),
 2353:     error = maps:take("hi", M1),
 2354:     4 = maps:size(M1),
 2355: 
 2356:     {3, M2} = maps:take(int, M1),
 2357:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629,<<"key">>],maps:keys(M2)),
 2358:     true = is_members([number,wat,<<"value">>],maps:values(M2)),
 2359:     error = maps:take(int, M2),
 2360:     3 = maps:size(M2),
 2361: 
 2362:     {<<"value">>,M3} = maps:take(<<"key">>, M2),
 2363:     true = is_members([4,18446744073709551629],maps:keys(M3)),
 2364:     true = is_members([number,wat],maps:values(M3)),
 2365:     error = maps:take(<<"key">>, M3),
 2366:     2 = maps:size(M3),
 2367: 
 2368:     {wat,M4} = maps:take(18446744073709551629, M3),
 2369:     true = is_members([4],maps:keys(M4)),
 2370:     true = is_members([number],maps:values(M4)),
 2371:     error = maps:take(18446744073709551629, M4),
 2372:     1 = maps:size(M4),
 2373: 
 2374:     {number,M5} = maps:take(4, M4),
 2375:     [] = maps:keys(M5),
 2376:     [] = maps:values(M5),
 2377:     error = maps:take(4, M5),
 2378:     0 = maps:size(M5),
 2379:

 2381: 
 2382:     %% error case
 2383:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2384: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,take,_,_}|_]}} = (catch maps:take(a, T))
 2385: 	      end),

 2388: t_bif_map_take_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2389:     KVs = [{{erlang:md5(<<I:64>>),I}, I}|| I <- lists:seq(1,500)],
 2390:     M0 = maps:from_list(KVs),
 2391:     ok = bif_map_take_all(KVs, M0),
 2392:     ok.
 2393: 
 2394: bif_map_take_all([], M0) ->
 2395:     0 = maps:size(M0),
 2396:     ok;
 2397: bif_map_take_all([{K,V}|KVs],M0) ->
 2398:     {ok,V} = maps:find(K,M0),
 2399:     {V,M1} = maps:take(K,M0),
 2400:     error  = maps:find(K,M1),
 2401:     error  = maps:take(K,M1),
 2402:     bif_map_take_all(KVs,M1).
 2403:

 2405: t_bif_map_update(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2406:     M0 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
 2407: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
 2408: 
 2409:     #{ "hi" := "hello again", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2410: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:update("hi", "hello again", M0),
 2411: 
 2412:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 1337, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2413: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:update(int, 1337, M0),
 2414: 
 2415:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"new value">>,
 2416: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:update(<<"key">>, <<"new value">>, M0),
 2417: 
 2418:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2419: 	4 := integer, 18446744073709551629 := wat} = maps:update(4, integer, M0),
 2420: 
 2421:     #{ "hi" := "hello", int := 3, <<"key">> := <<"value">>,
 2422: 	4 := number, 18446744073709551629 := wazzup} = maps:update(18446744073709551629, wazzup, M0),
 2423: 
 2424:     %% error case
 2425:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2426: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,update,_,_}|_]}} =
 2427: 			  (catch maps:update(1, none, T))
 2428: 	      end),
 2429:     ok.

 2433: t_bif_map_values(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2434: 
 2435:     [] = maps:values(#{}),
 2436:     [1] = maps:values(#{a=>1}),
 2437: 
 2438:     true = is_members([a,b,c,d,e],maps:values(#{ 1 => a, 2 => b, 3 => c, 4 => d, 5 => e})),
 2439:     true = is_members([a,b,c,d,e],maps:values(#{ 4 => d, 5 => e, 1 => a, 2 => b, 3 => c})),
 2440: 
 2441:     M1 = #{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>, 4 => number},
 2442:     M2 = M1#{ "hi" => "hello2", <<"key">> => <<"value2">> },
 2443:     true = is_members([number,3,"hello2",<<"value2">>],maps:values(M2)),
 2444:     true = is_members([number,3,"hello",<<"value">>],maps:values(M1)),
 2445: 
 2446:     Vs = lists:seq(1000,20000),
 2447:     M3 = maps:from_list([{K,K}||K<-Vs]),
 2448:     M4 = maps:merge(M1,M3),
 2449:     M5 = maps:merge(M2,M3),
 2450:     true = is_members(Vs,maps:values(M3)),
 2451:     true = is_members([number,3,"hello",<<"value">>]++Vs,maps:values(M4)),
 2452:     true = is_members([number,3,"hello2",<<"value2">>]++Vs,maps:values(M5)),
 2453: 
 2454:     %% error case
 2455:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2456: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,values,_,_}|_]}} =
 2457: 			  (catch maps:values(T))
 2458: 	      end),
 2459:     ok.

 2468: 
 2469:     39679005 = erlang:phash2(#{}),
